summary: A Levelled Item List and NPC change for Vampires
descriptionHtml:
I always play as a vampire using the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9557/]Alternate Start mod by Arthmoor[/url], and even if I don't I end up purposefully trying to contract Sanguine Vampiris. I also love using the two armour mods by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3196427/]AmethystDeceiver[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5696/]The Black Sacrament[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25852/]Lustmord Vampire Armour[/url]. As part of my vampire characters I also [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51596/]Daedra of Coldharbour by Aipex8[/url].

A while ago I created a mod to make use of all three vampire mods by integrating them with the Stock skyrim Vampires so i thought I'd upload it to the nexus.

[size=2]This mod at the moment does the following things:
[/size][list][*][size=2]Uses many of the Lustmord and Black Sacrament armour pieces in a random Levelled Item list so that you can see them on vampire NPCs in the game
[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Only uses duplicates of the armours scaled down to steel weapon and stock vampire armor levels for balance reasons
[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Does the same for vampire levelled weapon lists so they use the Lustmord crossbow and Black Sacrament models
[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Provides a random assortment of these armours and weapons when you start as a vampire in Mara's Eye vampire den with Arthmoor's Alternate Start
[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Alters the spell lists of vampires so that they cast Colharbour Flame spells and can summon Coldharbour Dremora/Atronachs[/size][/*]
[/list][size=2]
Please see the pictures and videos for examples.

Pre-requisites:
[/size][list][*][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51596/]Daedra of Coldharbour[/url] by Aipex8
[/size][/*]
[*][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5696/]Arise - Chapter 1 - The Black Sacrament[/url] by AmethystDeceiver
[/size][/*]
[*][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25852/]Lustmord Vampire Armor[/url] by AmethystDeceiver
[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Dawnguard by some people called Bethesda[/size][/*]
[/list][size=2]
Recommendations:
[/size][list][*][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24222/]Vampiric Thirst - Dawnguard Edition[/url] by Miss Leeches[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]If you play VTM Bloodlines, check out [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/vampirebloodlines/mods/10/]my ENB[/url] for it and also this [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/vampirebloodlines/mods/9/]NIN soundtrack mod[/url][/size][/*]
[/list][size=2]
Installation:
[/size][list][*][size=2]Use NMM, it should work fine[/size][/*]
[/list][size=2]
Credits:
[/size][list][*][size=2]Aipex8 for all the wonderfully capital work on Coldharbour and Vampire mods
[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]AmethystDeceiver for fantastically marvellous armour mods
[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Bethesda for you know, stuff they did
[/size][/*]
[/list][size=2]
Notes:
[/size][list][*][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/8521087]germanbahah[/url] has confirmed that the .esp involved in this mod and the pre-requisite mods can all combine fine using tes5edit if you are running out of mod slots.
[/size][/*]
[/list][size=2]
Future Plans:
[/size][list][*][size=2]I'd like to add in lots of quests and artifacts plus some new guilds, i have ideas. I'm getting tired of playing through Dawnguard, which with every single character of mine being a vampire becomes tedious as wonderful as it is. What if a Vampire playthrough had more content that was vampire specific? Egads! *shrug* don't know what yet, don't hold me to it[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]I'd love to make another set of levelled lists that include Zerofrosts brilliant armour, might add that as well in a serpate download[/size][/*]
[/list][size=2]

[youtube]H0GQAjt-VCc[/youtube][youtube]DrhTiZnKsoA?t=2m43s[/youtube]
[/size]
author: Dev0lv0r
